RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats

RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats Class Reference

#include <meshviewerstats.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A Qt widget than can be 'linked' to a MeshViewer to draw some statistics.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::setFps ( int  fps  )  [slot]

Changes the FPS count.

This slot is designed to be connected to the MeshViewer::updateFpsCount() signal.

Parameters:
fps The number of frame per second

Definition at line 105 of file meshviewerstats.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::setTri ( int  tri  )  [slot]

Changes the triangle count.

This slot is designed to be connected to the MeshViewer::updateTriCount() signal.

Parameters:
tri The number of triangle

Definition at line 118 of file meshviewerstats.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::updateCamStats (  )  [slot]

Update the camera statistics.

As this is not a slot, this method must be called either in setFps or setTri.

Definition at line 128 of file meshviewerstats.cpp.

QString RainbruRPG::Editor::MeshViewerStats::vectorToString ( const Ogre::Vector3 &  v  )  [private]

Converts an Ogre Vector3 to a QString.

This function is used to print the camera position and orientation. The values are shown with the 9.99format. They are troncated if needed

Parameters:
v The Ogre vector to convert
Returns:
The resulted QString
